project_descr: The overall objective of the Project is to contribute to the long-term environmental sustainability and inclusive economic development.

outputs.output_descr: - Central and local actors acquire tools and methodologies for IWRM (Integrated Water Resource Management) and fostering trans-boundary dialogue.
